what_you_do: Diversity Mortgage & Financial Corporation conducts business in the following areas: pre-approvals, mortgages, refinances, reverse mortgages for residential & commercial properties in Calgary, around Alberta and across Canada.
who_you_serve: Women of diverse backgrounds, who participate more actively in their financial wellbeing and asset development.
offering: Diversity Mortgage & Financial Corporation supports Mortgage Associates/Mortgage Brokers in determining their life-work balance through part-time or full-time mortgage business and life-long learning through professional development.
business_focus: Diversity Mortgage & Financial Corporation is a company that recognizes the financial landscape is changing and is committed to service excellence to support women both as Mortgage Associates and as Customers to build their financial futures.
